channel.title: Modelisation on Dimitri Fontaine, PostgreSQL Expert
channel.description: Recent content in Modelisation on Dimitri Fontaine, PostgreSQL Expert

item.title: Database Modelization Anti-Patterns
item.description: Next week we see two awesome PostgreSQL conferences in Europe, back to back, with a day in between just so that people may attend both! In chronological order we have first Nordic pgDay in Oslo where I will have the pleasure to talk about Data Modeling, Normalization and Denormalization. Then we have pgday.paris with an awesome schedule and a strong focus on the needs of application developers!
